document.full_text: a federal judge on thursday barred the jury at barry bonds' perjury trial from hearing angry voicemails the home run king left with his mistress during a stormy nine-year relationship.
document.title: judge bars bonds's voicemails from perjury trial
lines_and_colors: a federal judge on thursday barred the jury at barry bonds' perjury trial from hearing angry voicemails the home run king left with his mistress during a stormy nine-year relationship.
